baseline_templates.name: Foundational Growth (3-Day Full Body)
baseline_templates.reasoning: Focuses on compound movements to maximize newbie gains while allowing 48h recovery. Volume set at Maintenance/Minimum Effective (10-12 sets/muscle/week) to build work capacity without overtraining.

baseline_templates.name: Sculpt & Strength (3-Day Full Body)
baseline_templates.reasoning: Leverages women's generally higher fatigue resistance. Slightly higher repetition ranges (10-15) to focus on mind-muscle connection and form, with emphasis on posterior chain development.

baseline_templates.name: Longevity Strength (Upper/Lower Split)
baseline_templates.reasoning: Accounts for slower systemic recovery in 40+ athletes. Uses an Upper/Lower split to prevent joint overuse while maintaining high intensity on primary lifts. Rep ranges are 5-8 to build strength without excessive metabolic stress.

baseline_templates.name: Vitality & Balance (2-Day Full Body)
baseline_templates.reasoning: Prioritizes functional mobility, bone density, and fall prevention. Lower volume and higher rest periods to accommodate slower heart rate recovery. Includes balance-specific movements.

baseline_templates.name: Metabolic Power (PPL)
baseline_templates.reasoning: High-frequency Push/Pull/Legs split to maximize caloric expenditure while preserving muscle tissue during a deficit. Incorporates supersets for metabolic stress.
